Hints: This person established a common-law marriage with Deborah Read on September 1, 1730.
This person spent two months in Germany in 1766, but his connections to the country stretched across a lifetime.
In 1723, at the age of 17, this person proposed to 15-year-old Deborah Read while a boarder in the Read home.
